title: Thornton Burgess Animal Stories
description: Stories and poems: Bobby Coon's Mistake; Bobby Coon; The Three Little Bears; Little Bears; Peter Rabbit Proves A Friend; Old Mr. Toad; Reddy Fox's Sudden Engagement; Reddy Fox; Paddy's Surprise Visitor; Paddy Beaver; A Merry Coasting Party; Little Joe Otter; Young Flash the Deer; Young Flash the Deer (poem); A Robber Meets His Match and Robber the Rat.
author: Thornton W. Burgess
